explanation: The majority of opinions suggest caution against longing BTC at the current levels, with several users warning of high downside risk and limited upside. Some note that longs have been punished recently and that liquidations at higher levels may act as a magnet, implying potential for a downward move before any recovery. A few positive and neutral voices are present, but the warnings dominate.
representative_opinions: Christopher Harvey: DO NOT LONG RIGHT NOW
OH YEAH!: longs coming back in, when hasn't bitcoin punished a long the last few days
Christopher Harvey: the downside to a long going south right now is big
Phonz: Liqs at 109k are a magnet. Its going there
oscartg638: This is the bulls defending the triangle
Hoover: lets go, so we can go back up from there
